metadata.titel_preek: The Epiphany and the Presentation: The Light of the Gentiles

primair_narratief_programma.beschrijving: God reveals His Son as the King and Savior to both Jews and Gentiles, drawing the world to Himself despite cosmic and political opposition.

tekstueel_bewijs: A journey directed from beginning to end by the unseen but ever-present God.
It is the Creator himself who has commanded a star to lead the Gentile world.
God acts to reveal his Son as the Savior of the whole world.

object.identificatie: The Revelation/Salvation of Jesus Christ to the Nations
tekstueel_bewijs: The manifestation of the infant as both the glory of Israel and the Light of the Gentiles.
God acts to reveal his Son as the Savior of the whole world.
He who brings out their host by number, calling them all by name.

ontvanger.identificatie: The Gentiles (and by extension, the Hearer)
tekstueel_bewijs: Gentiles... who once were far off have been brought near.
Drawing to himself those who are 'strangers to the covenants of promise'.
ontvanger.positie_hoorder: The hearer identifies as the Receiver (the Gentile brought near).

helper.identificatie: The Star, the Prophets (Isaiah, Simeon, Anna), and the Holy Spirit
tekstueel_bewijs: The star is the cosmic sign that God uses.
Simeon and Anna... their prophetic utterances.
helper.rol_van_god: God is the primary Subject; the Star and Prophets are His instruments.
helper.rol_van_geest: External help through revelation and prophecy.

tekstueel_bewijs: Symptomatic of the operations of the primeval adversary.
Satan and his legions occupied this planet... holding the creation in the grip of sin and death.
tegenstander.toelichting_ernst: The opponent is not merely a bad king, but the 'primeval adversary' holding the world in an ontological grip of death.

secundair_narratief_programma.beschrijving: The Magi and the aged prophets respond to the revelation through worship and testimony.
secundair_narratief_programma.subject: The Magi / Simeon / Anna
secundair_narratief_programma.object: Worship and recognition of Christ's worth-ship.
secundair_narratief_programma.toelichting_verhouding: The human response (Secondary) is a direct result of God's prior revelation (Primary).

actantieel_schema_visualisatie.subject_naar_object: God → Revealing Christ to the World

voorbeelden_god_subject: God acts to reveal his Son.
The Creator himself who has commanded a star.
He remains the King of the Jews.
voorbeelden_mens_subject: The Magi seek a greater ruler.
Artists have always delighted in depicting.
We should make an effort to strip away.

voorbeelden: We should make an effort to strip away.
The only possible victory... is in the coming of the King himself.
Jesus was born precisely to engage in a battle to the death.

modale_analyse.modale_interpretatie: The sermon focuses on God's power (Pouvoir) to save and reveal, rather than the hearer's obligation (Devoir).

semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.beweging_in_preek: From Alienation (~S1) to Revelation (S1), while acknowledging that S1 involves a battle against S2 and leads through the shadow of the Cross (~S2).
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.theologische_resolutie: The tension is resolved by the 'Christus Victor' motif: the King comes to 'rifle Satan's fold'.
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.ernst_van_s2: Very high; the 'Slaughter of the Innocents' and 'Satan’s fold' are treated as grim realities.

diagnostische_evaluatie.classificatie_toelichting: The sermon is profoundly theocentric. God is the primary actor who initiates the star, the prophecy, and the salvation. The human characters are receivers of a revelation they did not initiate.

indicatoren_moralisme.tekstueel_bewijs: We should make an effort to strip away all the accumulated accretions.

indicatoren_genade.tekstueel_bewijs: God acts to reveal his Son as the Savior of the whole world.
The Gentiles... were brought near in the blood of Christ.

exemplarisme_check.beschrijving: The Magi and Simeon are not presented as models of behavior to imitate, but as witnesses to what God has done.
exemplarisme_check.alternatieve_lezing: The sermon already uses a theocentric reading: Simeon and the Magi are 'signs' and 'representatives' of God's global reach.

identificatie_patroon.effect_op_hoorder: Assurance and awe; the hearer is the 'Gentile' who has been 'brought near'.
identificatie_patroon.theologische_implicatie: Monergistic revelation; God finds the lost.

narratieve_coherentie.coherentie_beschrijving: The transition from the Magi to Simeon is seamless, unified by the theme of 'Epiphany' and God's initiative.
spanning_punten: The tension between the 'radiant time' of Epiphany and the 'shadow of the Passion'.

soteriologie.tekstueel_bewijs: Jesus was born precisely to engage in a battle to the death with this enemy.

pneumatologie.competentie_schenking: The Spirit acts through the 'prophetic utterances' to grant Savoir (knowledge) to the people.

hamartologie.ernst_diagnose: Severe; described as a 'grip' and a 'malevolent force'.

aanbevelingen.actantiele_audit_samenvatting: The narrative engine is driven by God's will to be known. The hearer is correctly positioned as the beneficiary of cosmic action.

modale_balans.voorgestelde_balans: Maintain; this is appropriate for Epiphany.
modale_balans.concrete_suggestie: Could slightly increase the 'Vouloir' (response of the heart) as a fruit of the revelation.

tegenstander_intensivering.huidige_status: The opponent (Satan/Death) is already sufficiently intensified.

narratieve_hierarchie_herstel.voorgestelde_structuur: Soteriology (God reveals) clearly precedes and enables the response (Magi worship).

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: This sermon is a masterclass in theocentric narrative. It avoids the trap of turning the Magi into 'examples of seekers' and instead presents them as 'trophies of grace' drawn by a sovereign God.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_retorische_analyse: A rhetorical analysis would focus on the use of imagery (stars, camels); Greimas reveals that the 'Star' is actually a functional Helper for the Divine Subject.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_exegese: Exegesis explains the Greek 'magoi'; semiotics explains that their function is to represent the 'Receiver' actant in the global transmission of grace.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_greimas: Greimas highlights that Herod is not just a character but the 'Opponent' actant, making the story a cosmic conflict rather than a historical anecdote.

appendices.notities: The sermon successfully maintains God as the subject of the 'heavy' verbs (save, reveal, command) while humans remain subjects of 'responsive' verbs (worship, see, depart).
